dc_title_s: State of Michigan compiled from the official records of the General Land Office and other sources by C. Roser, principal draughtsman G.L.O.
dc_description_s: At head of title: Department of the Interior. General Land Office. J.A. Williamson, Commissioner. Greenwich and Washington prime meridians. 1 map: col.; 75 x 63 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Roser, C.,Williamson, J.,United States. General Land Office.
